name: T - Emily Carson
_source: speak;Carson; Keep sharp, Emily.{w} These demons{tgm}...{tgm} they're not going to let up.
speak;Emily; Don't treat me like I don't know.{w} My town was destroyed by these abominations, remember?
speak;Carson; Oh, right{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Forgive me, I just wanted to make sure we're properly rallied.{w} Your arrows are too valuable to miss.
speak;Emily; My arrows will fly just fine.{w} Just stay out of my way, little man.
speak;Carson; I'm really not a little ma-
speak;Emily; Repair your ego some other time.{w} Just swing your sword at some damn monsters!
